ej,buenf001,P,rapue901,Throwing a pitch behind Alfonso Soriano $the first pitch by Francisley Bueno to Alfonso Soriano was behind Soriano's head, which was possible retaliation for Soriano's pose at the plate in the previous inning; Bueno was ejected by HP umpire Ed Rapuano; this was Bueno's first game in the majors2008ATL.EVN.regular.comment.csv"
